channel.title: Batch error (rep++)
channel.description:
Can someone tell me how to fix this .. nobody can get onto my server on while this is happening [code][8/23/11 7:46 PM]: Launching Deadscape in 3... 2... 1... Starting...Now! [8/23/11 7:46 PM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:5555 [8/23/11 7:48 PM]: [REGISTERED]: nsf [8/23/11 7:48 PM]: Game saved for player nsf [8/23/11 7:48 PM]: [DEREGISTERED]: nsf [8/23/11 7:48 PM]: Connection Problem [8/23/11 7:48 PM]: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Comm unications link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 1,314,125,302,200 mill iseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 millisecond s ago. item.title: Batch error (rep++)
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

Thanks … just realised my webhost payment is due … shall be fixed in a couple of days

item.title: Batch error (rep++)

item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

It cannot connect to the link or w.e you’re trying to do via MYSQL.
